name: ASUS RT-BE88U WiFi 7 Router
description: Next-gen WiFi 7 router with 7200Mbps speeds and dual 10G ports. Features AiMesh support, advanced security, and ASUS router expertise in the newest standard.

reviews.review_text: WiFi 7 speeds are real. Massive improvement.
Dual 10G ports are perfect for my setup.
Expensive but best WiFi 7 router available.
